Package com.nrifintech.cms.services

package com.nrifintech.cms.services
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AnalyticsService
    This class is used to get analytics data from the database
    AuthenticationService
    It has methods to authenticate, forget password, change password, set new password and activate user
    CartItemService
    It takes a list of CartItemUpdateRequest objects, gets the corresponding items from the ItemService, and then creates CartItem objects from the Item objects and the quantity from the CartItemUpdateRequest objects
    CartService
    It's a service class that handles the business logic of the cart
    FeedBackService
    FeedBackService is a class that has a method addFeedBack that takes a FeedBack object and returns a FeedBack object
    ImageService
    It takes in a base64 image, converts it to a byte array, hashes the image name and type, and saves it to a file.
    InventoryService
    This class is used to perform CRUD operations on the Inventory table.
    ItemService
    It's a service class that has a method to add an item to the database.
    LogoutService
    This class is responsible for adding the JWT to the blacklist when the user logs out.
    MenuService
     
    OrderService
    This class is used to add, get, update and delete orders
    PurchaseService
    This class is a service class that provides the business logic for the purchase entity
    SMTPservices
    This class is used to send emails using SMTP
    TransactionService
    The TransactionService class is a service class that implements the Validator interface
    UserService
     
    WalletService
    This class is responsible for all the wallet related operations
